title: paghaivanukkaruLvAi
sahitya: paghaivanuk-karuLvAi nannenjE paghaivanuk-karuLvAicaraNam 1 pughai naDuvinil tIyiruppadaip-bhUmiyir-kaNDOmE nannenjE bhUmiyir-kaNDOmEpaghai naDuvil anburuvAnarum paraman vAzhginrAn nannenjE paraman vAzhgirAn    caraNam 2  shippiyilE nalla muttu viLaindiDum sheidi ariyAyO nannenjE kuppaiyilE malar konjum kurukkattik-koDi vaLarAdO nannenjE   caraNam 3  uLLa niraivilOr kaLLam pughundiDil uLLa niraivAmO nannenjEteLLiya tEnilOr shiridu nanjaiyum shErtapin tEnAmO nannenjE   caraNam 4  vAzhvai ninaittapin tAzhvai ninaippadu vAzhuvkku nEramO nannenjEtAzhvu pirarkkeNNa-tAnazhiyAn enra shAttiram kELAyO nannenjE   caraNam 5  pOrukku vandangu edirtta kauravar pOla vandAnumavan nannenjEtEruk-karjunan tErirk-kashai koNDu ninradum kaNNanenrO nannenjE   caraNam 6  tinna varum puli tannaiyum anbODu cintaiyil pOTriDuvAi nannenjEannai parAshakti avvuruvAyinaL avaLaik-kumbiDuvAi nannenjE
